uqpaqyAqmagRu#hItO &syaqntarya#cCa maGavan pAqhi sOma#muruqShya rAyaqH samiShO# yajasvAq&ntastE# dadhAmiq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI aqntaruqrva#ntari#kSha(gm) saqjOShA# dEqvairava#raiqH parai$ScA&ntaryAqmE ma#Gavan mAdayasvaq svAMkRu#tO&siq madhu#matIrnaq iSha#skRudhiq viSvE$ByastvEndriqyEByO# diqvyEByaqH pArthi#vEByOq mana#stvA &ShTUqrva#ntari#kShaqmanvi#hiq svAhA$ tvA suBavaqH sUryA#ya dEqvEBya# ( ) stvA marIciqpEBya# EqSha tEq yOnirapAqnAya# tvA || 4 
(dEqvEBya#H - saqpta ca#) (A3)
